definition: gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
surname Men
the one and only way/the only proper course to take

sentences.english: A monetary rule is a requisite for restoring the Fed’s independence.
sentences.chinese: 貨幣規則是重建美聯儲獨立性的不二法門。

sentences.english: He also thanked China for sending the Buddha Finger Sarira of Famen Temple in Shanxi for enshrinement in the ROK.
sentences.chinese: 他還對陝西法門寺佛指舍利來韓供奉表示感謝。

sentences.english: In contrast, during the Famennian the radiolarian fauna was well developed and diversified.
sentences.chinese: 相反，放射蟲動物羣在法門期得到了重大發展。

sentences.english: The first rule in winning is to participate!
sentences.chinese: 參與是獲得勝利的不二法門。

sentences.english: I was taught by my master that the core of this path is remembering the guru.
sentences.chinese: 我的上師教導我，這個法門的核心就在於憶念上師。

sentences.english: Images are agood way to catch a visitors attention.
sentences.chinese: 圖像歷來是吸引眼球的不二法門。

sentences.english: Take in fewer calories than you burn, and you lose weight.
sentences.chinese: 喫得比你消耗的少，是減肥的不二法門。

sentences.english: Some scholars believe that the whole of basement was rendered as a mandala.
sentences.chinese: 有人認爲法門寺地宮構成一個完整的蔓荼羅。

sentences.english: If you cannot be that way, then you aren't really cultivating the Shurangama Dharma-door.
sentences.chinese: 不能這樣，就談不到真正修楞嚴法門。

sentences.english: The Famen Temple, Qian Mausoleum, The Tomb of Princess Yongtai 1- Day Private Tour.
sentences.chinese: 法門寺，乾陵，永泰公主墓，觀光獨立成團一日遊。

sentences.english: Because innumerable billions of Bodhisattvas also seek this wonderful and subtle Dharma School.
sentences.chinese: 彼無量億諸菩薩等，皆悉求此微妙法門。

sentences.english: The Lord has surely abandoned suffering as this Dhamma has been realized by him.
sentences.chinese: 世尊確實擺脫了痛苦，因爲你知道這個法門。

sentences.english: In short, patience is the most important of all methods of cultivation, and cannot be ignored or overlooked.
sentences.chinese: 淺言之，忍耐是修行法門最主要的，不可忽略。

sentences.english: Receiving the heart of brahma net sutra in jizulutos mountain .
sentences.chinese: 雞足蓮花山金剛塔座受持梵網經菩薩心地法門品。

sentences.english: The man is the only proper course to take, should never let him meet.
sentences.chinese: 抓住男人的不二法門，應該就是，永遠不要讓他滿足。

definition: to become enlightened (Buddhism)
origin
all living things
tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
to instruct (novices)/to preach/to teach/to reveal
Taoist or Buddhist rite/abbr. for 菩提道場|菩提道场[Pu2 ti2 dao4 chang3]
to vow
actual situation/the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
a flash of realization/the truth in a flash/a moment of enlightenment (usually Buddhist)
Zen Buddhism
to study/to practice
Buddhism
karmic reward (Buddhism)
Bodhisattva (Buddhism)
(of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
